Date: 2025-02-06 18:28
Subject: Tanagra x Elites Ramadan Shoot - Insurance Required
--------------------------------------------------
Hello Hagop, 

Hope all is well. 

I need your assistance in creating insurance for the items in the attached list. We will need these items for a shoot that is happening next week in Dubai. Ideally, the items need to be insured from the 9th of February to the 12th of February to ensure their safety. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Best,
Nesma Shahin.
